1000.name: 65% Mechanical Keyboard

1001.name: Wireless Mouse
1001.description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with 50m range, RGB lighting, and adjustable DPI for precise control.

1002.name: 27-inch 4K Monitor
1002.description: Ultra HD 4K monitor with vibrant colors, 60Hz refresh rate, and HDMI/DisplayPort inputs.

1003.name: USB-C Hub
1003.description: Multiport USB-C hub with 4 USB 3.0 ports, HDMI output, SD card reader, and fast data transfer.

1004.name: Noise Cancelling Headphones
1004.description: Over-ear wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 20-hour battery life, and Bluetooth 5.0.

1005.name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
1005.description: RGB mechanical gaming keyboard with customizable lighting, programmable macros, and wrist rest.

1006.name: Ergonomic Office Chair
1006.description: Comfortable ergonomic chair with adjustable height, lumbar support, and breathable mesh back.
